thread.title: Will new apps finally get carpool use on the fast track?
thread.title_full: Will new apps finally get carpool use on the fast track? - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Carolyn Said
title: Will new apps finally get carpool use on the fast track?
text:
Photo: Dorothy Edwards, The Chronicle Donna Scarola waits for her rider, Betty Cao, in Oakland for their commute to Pleasanton. They met through a new app called Scoop. Donna Scarola waits for her rider, Betty Cao, in Oakland for their...
Americans have learned to conserve water, recycle and schlep groceries in cloth bags. But many balk at the one change that would most help the planet: sharing a ride to work. Donna Scarola waits for her rider, Betty Cao, in Oakland for their commute to Pleasanton. They met through a new app called Scoop.
